Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: JersyMom
Reviews.Content: this phone is excellent, excellent packaging, phone is unlocked and im using my Serbian sim card in it, camera does great pictures, only complain I have is amazon listed it as dual optional sim, this phone is single normal size sim, if you want a dual sim order the s6812, seller is very curtious and replies on emails right away,

Reviews.Title: It's fantastic
Reviews.Author: José Domínguez E.
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use, screens friendly and long duration of the battery. The camera takes excellent pictures and the communication is clear

Reviews.Title: Beauty of device
Reviews.Author: Aldric George
Reviews.Content: This handset is very user friendly and has sleek design anyone looking for a reasonable android device should go for the samsung galaxy fame.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Titch
Reviews.Content: Was what I ordered, it was new and works well. Will recommend this to other customers if you are looking for a phone for a child.

Reviews.Title: Excelente terminal movil, lo recomiendo.
Reviews.Author: Rui Dos Santos Melim
Reviews.Content: Sencillo de usar, rápido y versátil. Elegante diseño minimalista y, l mejor, S.O: Android de última generación desde la fábrica.Simple to use, fast and versatile. Elegant minimalist design and its best feature, SO Android latest version from the factory.

Reviews.Title: Bad Screen
Reviews.Author: Liz Something
Reviews.Content: What a shame. This phone is just the right size for people who don't like to feel like they are carrying around and talking on a paperback, and has some workable specs. However, the screen is just awful, QVGA and low resolution guarantee an almost instantly bad viewing experience. Remember the old flip phones from 12 years ago? Well, Samsung does because that's the screen quality they used for this model.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Cecilia torres Armijos
Reviews.Content: thanks the product is so good im so thankful. this is what i was looking for thank you so much.
